metadata.description:
Collects Black Widow: The Coldest War GN and material from Marvel Fanfare #10-13 & Bizarre Adventures #25.

It's been a long, lively life for Natasha Romanova, the former Russian spy known as the Black Widow — fighting side by side with the Avengers, the Champions, S.H.I.E.L.D. and others. But could it end with the Widow surrounded by international assassins? Old enemies and new are using Natasha's instructor, her mentor and her ex-husband against her — or so it seems — but who and what can be trusted in a spy's landscape of lies? Guest-starring Nick Fury, Jimmy Woo and other espionage experts!
metadata.name: Black Widow: Web of Intrigue
